com.github.rolecraftdev.magic

Interface Spell

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ArrowShower, AvadaKedavra, Bomb, BreakBlock, BurnBlock, ExcellentBow, Farbreak, FarbreakSilkTouch, FireBeam, Fly, FreezeBlock, FreezeRay, HandCannon, LesserSword, Meteor, MiningHammer, MultiArrow, SilkTouch, StrongerBow, StrongerSword, WeakBow

    public interface Spell
    Represents a spell in Rolecraft
